thread.title_full: Watch Eric Andre Troll Carissa Rosario on the Latest Episode of ‘Eric Andre Interviews the Hot Babes of Instagram’

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Watch Eric Andre Troll Carissa Rosario on the Latest Episode of ‘Eric Andre Interviews the Hot Babes of Instagram’
text:
Eric Andre continues to horrify the Hot Babes of Instagram in his latest miniseries for Adult Swim. This time, it’s model Carissa Rosario who’s in line for what is arguably one of Eric’s most surreal pieces yet.
“Can you explain how pretty you are to a blind man?” poses the host, before conveniently shepherding in a blind person from backstage. Carissa does her best to explain, but the joke’s on her as, obviously, it turns out the man is not blind at all and instead possesses ears for eyes. From thereon, the interview only gets weirder, as the dude suspended from the ceiling by meat hooks appears again ( see previous episodes ), this time treating us to a spot of free jazz. If you think that’s bizarre, then wait until you reach the bloody crescendo.
Watch the hilarious interview in full over at the Adult Swim website .
Elsewhere in TV land, be sure to check out these images from Stranger Things season two.
